author: Ali
title: Sangria
ingredients: 2 bottles Spanish red wine (Rioja wine is most popular)
2 oranges, one juiced and one diced
optional sweetener: simple syrup* or maple syrup
optional bubbles: lemon-lime soda, ginger ale or sparkling water
instructions_list: Add the wine, brandy, orange juice, diced orange, diced apple, diced lemon and cinnamon stick to a large pitcher. Stir to combine. Taste and add in a few tablespoons of sweetener, if desired.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes or up to 4 hours.
Serve the sangria over ice, topping off each glass with a splash of bubbly soda (or sparkling water) if desired.
description: Learn how to make authentic Spanish sangria with this easy sangria recipe. It only takes a few minutes to prep, it's easy to customize with your favorite wine and fruit, and it's great for entertaining a crowd!
